NOT_FOUND.subheading: Account is not associated within the PCGL project.
NOT_FOUND.description: Looks like your account is currently not associated within the PCGL project and therefore cannot access the PCGL DACO Service. This may be due to the fact that you haven't completed the onboarding process for new accounts, or have logged in within an account not previously used. Please check and try again.

SYSTEM_ERROR.subheading: Looks like we ran into a little hiccup while completing the login process.
SYSTEM_ERROR.description: Please try again by clicking the "Login" button above or by navigating back to our homepage below.

FORBIDDEN.subheading: Looks like your browser used a stale session to attempt to login to the DCAO.
FORBIDDEN.description: Please try again by clicking the "Login" button above or by navigating back to our homepage below.

homepage.title: Apply for Access to Controlled Data
homepage.introduction: The PCGL Data Access Compliance Office (PCGL DACO) handles requests from scientists, researchers and commercial teams for access to PCGL Controlled Data.
homepage.authorizationText: Authorization for access to Pan-Canadian Genome Library controlled data is study based and is reviewed for compliance with PCGL Policies and Guidelines. The PCGL DACO is the overarching authority to ensure that data from the PCGL will only be used by qualified individuals for public health objectives.
homepage.dataAccessInfo: Before starting your application, learn more about Data Access and Use Policies and review our <link1>frequently asked questions</link1>.
homepage.description1: Log in and start an application. Carefully complete all required sections and review all policies and agreements.
homepage.description2: When completed, obtain the required signatures and submit the signed application for review.
homepage.description3: The PCGL DACO will review the application and approved project teams will be granted access to PCGL Controlled Data.

dashboard.title: My Applications
dashboard.description: This is where you can manage your Applications for Access to PCGL Controlled Data. Access will be granted starting from the date of approval by the PCGL DACO.
dashboard.hasAccess: You have access to PCGL Controlled Data
dashboard.noAccess: You do not have access to PCGL Controlled Data

repView.title: Welcome
repView.description: You are about to be redirected to a login page. Please login using your institutional email and begin the review.

status.404: Oops, we couldn't find what you were looking for!

alert.sizeWarning: This website may not be supported by your device.
alert.sizeDescription: Please visit this website using a device with a wider screen for optimal experience and access to all features.

403.title: Unauthorized.
403.message: Sorry, looks like you're not authorized to access this resource.

404.title: The requested resource could not be found.
404.message: Sorry, looks like the resource you're trying to access does not exist.

400.title: That was a bad request.
400.message: Sorry, looks like your browser sent a bad request, please reload the page and try again.

500.title: Something went wrong.
500.message: Sorry, something went wrong while processing your request on our end, please try again later.

applicationNotFound.title: The application you requested could not be found.
applicationNotFound.message: Sorry, looks like the application you're trying to access does not exist

fetchError.title: Unable to contact server
fetchError.message: Hmm, can't seem to contact the server, please check your internet connection.

generic.title: Something went wrong.
generic.message: Unable to process your request, please try again later.
